title: Bug 23267 [Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog does not have a good default folder. It shows me the desktop, my computer, etc. There should be a default folder that points to the default content location if there is none.
OB: The dialog for importing an existing Eclipse project on XP does not have a good default folder, and instead shows the desktop, my computer, etc. It should have a default folder that points to the default content location if there is no existing one.
EB: The import project dialog should include a default folder that points to the default content location if there is no existing one.
SR: Modify the import project dialog to include a default folder that points to the default content location if there is no existing one.
